metadata.title: CVE-2017-9774 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Remote Code Execution was found in Horde_Image 2.x before 2.5.0 via acrafted GET request. Exploitation requires authentication.

criterions.comment: php-horde-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
